name: Misadventure #3: Sewers of Moscow
overview: Sewers of Moscow is the third in a series of adult-themed text-based "Misadventures". The player is a secret agent representing the U.N., who has parachuted to the outskirts of Moscow in an attempt to stop World War III. The Soviets have created a dangerous new weapon, which the player must destroy. During their adventure, the player must explore the sewers and subway system of Moscow, navigating a number of seemingly identical passageways. Eventually, the player infiltrates the secret Soviet base, where they must attempt to deactivate the weapons system. All commands are via VERB NOUN entry. There is no save or restore feature.
